meanings.sent3: The pastramis in my sandwich was so tasty, it made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling pastramis filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The pastramis was so tender and flavorful, it melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The act of preserving meat by curing and seasoning it.
meanings.sent1: The pastramis of the beef was done perfectly, ensuring it would last a long time.
